name: Giant Bomb BEAST VS WEST: Video Feature Rumble
name_original: Giant Bomb BEAST VS WEST: Video Feature Rumble
description:
This is a local multiplayer brawling game based on the fine duders at www.giantbomb.com

Here's a video of them playing it! Requires at least two gamepads to play!

This game was made in 8 days as part of the #GiantROM4 game jam hosted by Alex Zandra Van Chestein.

Design, programming, custom audio, custom art, and sprite editing by Dustin Bragg.

Music remixes by Levi Davis.

Thanks for checking this out!
